title.rendered: “Breaking News: IDF Launches Counterattacks on Hezbollah Terrorist Infrastructure and Missile Cells in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

A short while ago, IDF tanks and a combat aircraft attacked terrorist infrastructures and a military command of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanon. In addition, a combat helicopter attacked a terror cell that tried to launch anti-tank missiles towards Israeli territory in the Yiftah region.

Additionally, in the past few hours, several launches have been identified from Lebanon towards various regions along the border. The IDF is striking the shooting origins in Lebanon. In addition, IDF forces attacked with barrage and artillery fire in the Lebanon area, in the Menara region, following a special identification.

Attached is documentation of the military command post attack: https://bit.ly/3RfC2R8
